definition: see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: Officials say they will intensify health screening measures at airports and ports.
sentences.chinese: 官员说，他们将加强在机场和港口的健康检查措施。

sentences.english: An elderly man visits the doctor for a checkup.
sentences.chinese: 一个上了年纪的男人请医生为他作健康检查。

sentences.english: I have check-ups every year, work out and take care of my health.
sentences.chinese: 我每年都做健康检查并根据状况进行锻炼和调理。

sentences.english: We waited around for the Doctor to come by and give Qing Ling a basic health check.
sentences.chinese: 我们等待医生来给青灵做基本的健康检查。

sentences.english: Take him for regular well-baby checkups and keep his immunizations up to date.
sentences.chinese: 带他去做常规的婴儿健康检查，并定期注射疫苗。

sentences.english: Required before the physical examination, be eligible to enrol in the competition.
sentences.chinese: 赛前需经身体健康检查，合格者方可报名参加比赛。

sentences.english: Take the case of health inspections of restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 以餐馆食品健康检查为例。

sentences.english: "It's a checkup for the deep ocean, " says Knap.
sentences.chinese: 正如克纳普所说，“这是对深海的一次健康检查。”

sentences.english: An employer shall give regular health check-ups to underage workers.
sentences.chinese: 用人单位应当对未成年工定期进行健康检查。

sentences.english: Do you support the elimination of compulsory pre-marriage check-up?
sentences.chinese: 你赞成强制性婚前健康检查的取消吗？

sentences.english: Health screening intensifies Officials say they will intensify health screening measures at airports and ports.
sentences.chinese: 官员说，他们将加强在机场和港口的健康检查措施。

definition: see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
abbr. for 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
to do a blood test/to have one's blood tested
abbr. for 產前檢查|产前检查[chan3 qian2 jian3 cha2]
